definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: But those who plan what is good find love and faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 谋善的，必得慈爱和诚实。

sentences.english: Praise God that He loves the oft-forgotten elderly.
sentences.chinese: 感谢神，祂的慈爱遍及被人遗忘的老人。

sentences.english: Sihon king of the Amorites His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 就是杀戮亚摩利王西宏，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: But let's make sure we do it graciously and prayerfully.
sentences.chinese: 但我们务必要以慈爱和祷告的心来作这工。

sentences.english: Compassion for fellowmen gives me courage in safeguarding life.
sentences.chinese: 有慈爱之心，就有勇气保卫生命。

sentences.english: 5 who by his understanding made the heavens, His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 称谢那用智慧造天的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: By day the LORD commands his steadfast love;
sentences.chinese: 白昼耶和华必向我施慈爱。

sentences.english: Grandmother appeared in the light, so mildness and kindliness.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶出现在亮光里，是那么温和，那么慈爱。

sentences.english: 7For the king trusts in the Lord ; through the unfailing love of the Most High he will not be shaken.
sentences.chinese: 王依靠耶和华，因至高者的慈爱必不摇动。

sentences.english: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever
sentences.chinese: 又杀巴珊王噩，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: He let them be pitied by all those who held them captive.
sentences.chinese: 使他们在俘掳他们的人前，成为自己慈爱怜悯的因缘。

sentences.english: Give thanks to the God of heaven. His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 你们要称谢天上的神，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: Gavest thou the goodly wings unto the peacocks? or wings and feathers unto the ostrich?
sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟的翅膀欢然搧展，岂是显慈爱的翎毛和羽毛么？

sentences.english: E is for her eyes, with love—light shining.
sentences.chinese: 是她闪著慈爱目光的一双眼睛。

sentences.english: When I said, 'My foot is slipping,' your love, O Lord , supported me.
sentences.chinese: 我正说我失了脚，耶和华阿，那时你的慈爱扶助我。

sentences.english: Loving God, we desire to be faithful.
sentences.chinese: 慈爱的神，我们渴望忠心于祢。

definition: to have tender affection for/to love tenderly/to pamper sb
Renai or Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
